Capitol .xxiii.	Chapter 23.
De cauterizacio de rauquiera de votz e de constriccio de ale.	Regarding the cauterization of the throat for voice issues and the treatment of suffocation.
Quan las humiditatz veno sobre le quanal del pulmo, e majorment quan aquo es am fregiditat de compleccio, lahoras cove que·l malaute sia evacuat al comensament am medicinas laxativas, e aprop cauteriza aquel deves la razit del golayro en le loc depremegut.	When moisture accumulates in the lungs, especially when it is caused by a cold constitution, the patient should be evacuated at the beginning with laxative medicines, and then cauterize that area around the base of the neck where needed.
E guarda te que no pervenguas am le cauteri al golayro ni no comburas de la codena de lu sino un pauc.	Make sure you do not apply the cautery to the neck itself, nor burn its tendons excessively.
E cauteriza aquel am autra cauteri deves la junctura del col en le derier espondil de lu.	Cauterize that area with another cautery tool at the junction of the spine in the lower back.
E·l cauteri de lu sia clavilh sego la maniera precedent.	Let the cauterization be fixed according to the previous method.
E aprop cura aquel am aquo que es precedit entro que sia sanat.	Then treat him with the previously mentioned remedies until he is healed.
Capitol .xxiiii.	Chapter 24.
De cauterizacio de malautia del pulmo e de tos.	On the cauterization for lung disease and coughing.
Quan tos e malautia de pulmo so de humiditatz fregas e le malaute no ha febre ni tisic e es malautia antiqua, lahoras cauterisa aquel am dos cauteris sobre la furcula en les locz depremegutz leontz e buoytz; e am autra cauteri en le mieg loc del pietz entre dos mamillos; e sia le cauteri clavilh segon la forma precedent.	When coughing and lung disease are caused by cold and damp humors, and the patient has no fever or cough, and it is an old illness, then cauterize them with two cauteries on the furcula (collarbone) in the areas below the lions (shoulders) and breasts; and another cautery on the mid-point of the foot between two mammillae (breasts); and let the cautery be fixed according to the preceding form.
E si vols, sia la tua cauterizacio punctan am le cauteri que es apelat puncta, la forma del qual precedeys en la ponctacio de dolor de aurelhas.	And if you wish, your cauterization may be done by puncturing with the cautery called 'puncta', the form of which was described earlier in the section on earache puncture.
E sian puntz entro cays ad aquels; e aprop cura aquel am aquo meteys que es precedit entro que sia sanat.	And if there is pus in any of them, then treat him with what was mentioned earlier to be put on so that he may be cured.
E ya sia le cauteri haventz tres ramps quar cauterizacio es am aquel: am una veguada podes far tres cauteris segon aquesta forma:	And already the cautery has three marks, as this cauterization can be done with it: in one go you may do three cauteries according to this form:
Capitol .xxv.	Chapter 25.
De cauterizacio de titillic que es le cap del ajutori.	On the cauterization of titillic, which is the head of the hyoid bone.
Quan le cap del ajutori es dislocat per causa de humiditatz lubricas e no es fermat en la hora del sieu retornament deves la sua dislocacio entro que sia a lu aquo costuma de retornar, e aprop per un petit movement es deslocat ayssi que s’endeve, ayssi cum nos havem testificat, lahoras cove que primieyrament redusiscas la dislocacio, e aprop le malaute sia reversat sobre le sieu dos o sobre le latz sa; e aprop eleva la codena la qual es en la partida dedintz del citillic a las partidas desus am les ditz de la tua ma sinistra, si la junctura es dislocada a las partidas dedintz.	When the head of the humerus is dislocated due to lubricating humidity and it is not firmly held during its return, you must guide its dislocation so that it returns to its usual position; then, with a slight movement, displace it so it falls back into place as we have witnessed. Then you should first reduce the dislocation by reversing the patient onto their back or side; next, raise the elbow which is on the inner side of the armpit towards the upper parts using your left hand's fingers if the joint is dislocated inwards
E aprop igneys le cauteri havent dos caps; e aquesta es la forma de lu:	Then take a cautery with two heads; this is its shape...
E aprop cauteriza la codena entro que penetre aquela entro al autre latz; e vindra la figura de cauterizacio lahoras de iv caps cauteris.	...and cauterize the elbow so that it penetrates from one side to the other; this will create a cauterization figure with two heads of the cautery.
e so aquel subtils segon la quantitat de tenta; e aquesta es la forma de lu:	According to its size, make it subtle, this is how you do it...
E alcunas veguadas es ajustat segon aquest comte i per que son les cauteris .viii.	Sometimes, according to the above account, eight cauteries would be used for adjustment.
E aprop pausa sobre le cauteri porys cuytz am sal, e aprop fay adherir le malaute a trenquilitat, e lo membre no sia maugut per alcun temps entro que sia confortat.	Place salt on the cautery with holes and then ask the patient to remain calm; make sure the member is not moved for some time until it has healed.
E si la dislocacio es a las partidas desus e tart es fayt aquo, lahoras cauteriza sobre le muscle am cauteri clavilh o am motz cauteris puntan, quar la junctura es confermada e la humiditat es romauguda e le malaute es sanat.	And if the dislocation is in the upper parts and it is done this way, then cauterize on the muscle with a large/pointed cautery or many small cauteries, for the joint is confirmed, moisture is driven out, and the patient is healed.
Capitol .xxvi.	Chapter 26.
De cauterizacio del stomac.	On the cauterization of the stomach.
Quan veno en l’estomac freg e motas humiditatz entro que aquel extrazo de la sua compleccio e so multiplicatz raumases a lu, e si tu continuas las manieyras de curacio e no confereyso, lahoras cove que le malaute sia sobre le sieu dos ressupinat, e extenda las suas mas e las suas coysas, e aprop cauteriza aquel am tres cauteris: an un cauteri dejos le pietz per la quantitat d’un dit am cauteri clavilh, e am dos cauteris dejos del dos costatz del cauteri, entro que vengua la figura de cauteri triangulada; e elonga entre els que no sian ajustatz que faran poyredura.	When coldness and moisture come into the stomach, which disturbs its natural condition and multiplies raw material in it, and if you continue the methods of cure but do not confirm them, then place the patient on his back again and extend their arms and legs, and cauterize that part with three cauteries: one under the foot for a finger's length using a large/pointed cautery, and two cauteries under the two sides of it so that the shape of the cauterization is triangular; elongate between them without fitting closely together so that they make scabs.
E si la profunditat del cauteri la quantitat de les dos terses de la grocesa de la codena.	And if the depth of the cauterization is about two thirds of the thickness of a wire.
E sia la figura del cauteri segon aquesta forma ses addicio, E si vols, cauteriza am gran cauteri en le mieg loc del estomac segon aquesta forma; et aquest sia un cauteri segon la forma de cercle segon aquesta forma:	And the figure of the cautery is according to this addition, E if you wish, cauterize with a large cautery in the middle of the stomach according to this form; and this should be a cautery according to the shape of a circle according to this form:" (It seems that there would have been an illustration at this point in the original text.)
E sia cauterizat l’estomac punctan ad aquel que de aquest cauteri es spaventat: e es que tu senhes sobre l’estomac punt segon la quantitat que voles am tenta, e aprop cauteriza aquel am cauteri en les puntz; e aprop cura aquel am la curacio qu’es precedita entro que sia sanat. De cauterizacio del fietge fret.	De cauterizacio del fietge fret.
Quan endeve en le fietge dolor per fregiditat o per humiditat o per grossa ventositat entro que de la sieua normal compleccio sia getat per egressio superflua, e es curat le malaute am aquo que havem dit e no comfereys, lahoras cove que·l malaute sia ressupinat sobre la sua cervitz, e senhes am tenta tres cauteris segon aquesta forma et aquesta quantitat meteyssa sobre le fietge dejos dels ipocondres, la hon perve le decubit de home.	When there is pain in the kidneys due to coldness or excessive humidity and wind which has thrown it out of its normal state with superfluous movement, and the patient is treated as we have said without improvement, then it is advisable that the patient be turned over onto their neck, and you will place three cauterizers of this shape on top of each other above the kidney under the hypochondria where they are in contact with the skin.
E sia l’espazi le qual es entre quascun cauteri segon la grossetut del dit, e sia le cauteri segon la longitut del cors dreyta.	And the space between each cauterizer should be about the width of a finger, and the cauterizers themselves should have a length equivalent to that of one's own right hand.
E no compremas la tua am le cauteri mot.	And do not press hard with your cauterizers.
E si la quantitat de aquo que es adhurit la quantitat de la maytat de la specitut de la codena, e no y sia pus ajustat; e si le malaute stant sobre les pes de lu; e si no es estant, lahoras sia jassent, le qual ja ha extendudas las suas coysas, e eleve les sieus brasses.	If the amount of material that adheres to them is less than half the thickness of a chain link, and if it is not applied more firmly; and if the patient stands on their feet without collapsing further; or else they are sitting down with legs already spread apart, arms raised up slightly.
E es aquesta la forma del cauteri:	And this is the shape of the cauterizer: [here you could draw or describe a diagram]
E a tu es possible que cauterizes aquestz cauteris am cauteri cutellar, quan es am tu subtilitat e prudencia en l’art.	It is up to you whether you choose to cauterize these areas with the round-bladed cautery instrument; it depends on your skill and discretion in applying this art.  It may be a matter of personal preference or circumstance as to which method one employs, so long as proper care is taken.
E guarda te que trop no procesiscas en la cauterizacio, e sia adhurida la specitut de tota la codena per que sia adhurit tot le cors e pervengua entro als budels, quar la codena aqui es subtil; e sapias aquo.	And make sure you do not proceed too quickly with the cauterization process, ensuring that the entire surface of the flesh is adhered to so that the whole body is affected and it reaches the intestines, for the iron here is delicate; be aware of this.

De perforacio de apostema del fietge am cauteri.	On the perforation of kidney abscesses with a cautery.
Quan endeve excitura o apostema en le fietge e voles saber si aquel apostema es en le carn del fietge o en la tunica de lu, lahoras si es en la carn del fietge, le malaute atrobo gravitat e dolor ses acuitat.	When the abscess erupts in the kidney and you want to know if it is within the flesh of the kidney or its membrane, then if it is within the flesh of the kidney, the patient's condition will worsen and pain increases.
E si es en la tunica del fietge, am la dolor es acuitat gran e vezes que ja afatiguatz les metges la cura de lu.	And if it is in the membrane of the kidney, there will be great pain and often doctors are already tired of treating him.
Donc cove que·l malaute sia enversat sobre la sieua cervit; e aprop senha le loc de l’apostema am tenta; e aprop igneys le cauteri le quel es asemblat a rag, la forma del qual a precedit en l’autra pagina.	So have the patient lie on their back and examine the location of the abscess carefully; then take the cautery which is attached to a catgut thread, its shape described previously.
E cauteriza am aquel i cauteri entro que tota la codena sia comborida, entro que pervengua al ciphac, entro qu’en yesca sania.	E cauteriza am aquel i cauteri entro que tota la codena sia comborida, entro que pervengua al ciphac, entro qu’en yesca sania.
E aprop cura aquel per curacio dels autres apostemas entro que sia sanat.	And then treat him with the same cure as for other abscesses until he is healed.
E no cove que de aquesta forma de cauteri use sino aquel del qual le estudi en l’art de medicina es prolonguat, e en las mas del qual motas malautias an conogut; mays aquest am esperiment alcunas veguadas sia ardit sobre aquesta operacio, mays empero leyssa aquela deves nos, e es miels.	Only this form of cauterization should be used when the student in the art of medicine is experienced and skilled, having treated various ailments before; although he may have had some daring experiences with this operation, nonetheless, we must make it gentle and improve upon it.
Capitol .xxix.	Chapter 29.
De cauterizacio de plauresi.	On the cauterization of ulcers.
Diyssero les antics cauteri de las razitz de aristologia a plauresi frega segon aquesta manieyra esser fazedor, e es aquest que tu prenguas de las razitz de aristologia longa secca una razit pun longua que es trobada, e sia de la grossetut del dit.	The ancient cautery for ulcers was done by using the root of aristolochia, which is prepared in this way: take a long and thin root from the plant that is found to be as thick as your finger.
E aprop submergeys aquela en oli e eysen aquela al foc, e aprop cauteriza per un cauteri en aquel loc le qual es entre la continuacio de la furcula am le col; e am dos cauteris petitz dejos guidazi, un pauc declinans a la partida que es dejus la barba, e am dos cauteris en aquo que es declinant entre la quinta costa e la cizena, declinant un pauc a las partidas detras; e am autre cauteri en le mieg loc del pietz; et am autre sobre l’estomac, et am tres cauteris de las partidas detras; et am un cauteri en aquel loc le qual es entre las dos spallas, e am dos cauteris dels dos latz del pietz, dejos le cauteri le qual es entre doas spallas.	Then immerse it in oil and heat it over fire; then cauterize with a cautery at the point where the neck connects to the spine; also use two small cauteries below these, slightly angled towards the lower part of the beard area; and two more cauteries that are angled between the fifth rib and scapula, slightly angling downward toward the rear areas; another cautery in the middle of the chest; one over the stomach, three at the back; and one where it is located between both shoulders, as well as two on each side of the chest, below the one between the shoulders.
E no cove que compremas la tua ma am le cauteri, ans sia en le manifest de la codena en obra.	And do not hold your hand over the cautery; instead be in the visible part of the operation.
E ja diyssero alscus antics que so alscus dels homes les quals uson de cauteri de ferr semblant a ray e igneysso aquel, e meto aquel en aquel loc le qual es entre las costas, entro que pervenguam am aquel ad aquel apostema e sia foragetada sania, ayssi cum havem dit en l’apostema del fietge.	Some ancient ones said that some men use an iron cautery resembling a ray and set fire to it; then they put the hot iron in the space between the ribs so that we can reach the abscess and cure it, as we have said for liver abscesses.
Mays en aquesta perforacio am cauteri no es ses temor, quar hu mor tantost ho accideys en le loc fistula a la qual no es sanacio.	There is no fear in this cautery perforation because its mortality rate is almost instantaneous or the patient develops a fistula that cannot be healed.

De la cauterizacio de la melsa.	On cauterization of the mouth.
Quan tu curas la malautia de la melsa am aquo que havem dit de la curacio en la divisio e no confereys la tua curacio, lahoras cauteri en lu es segon tres manieras, las quals totas son dreyturieras, de las quals la una es que fassas tres cauteris o quatre linhan segon la longitut de la melsa segon la figura dels cauteris del fietge, la figura dels quals ha precedit. E sia entre quascun cauteri la grossetut d’un dit o un pauc mes, e la manieyra del cauteri sia la manieyra la qual havem dita en le cauteri del fietge engualment.	And the thickness of each cautery should be about the width of a finger or slightly more, and the shape of the cautery should be the same as we mentioned earlier for the cautery of the liver.
E no compremas la tua ma am le cauteri; e le malaute sia eves sobre lo sieu dos.	Do not press your hand onto the cautery; let the patient lie on their back.
E es autra manieyra de cauterizar, so es que tu igniscas le cauteri haventz dos vertimentz, la qual causa havem dita en le capitol de dislocacio del muscle, e elava la codena la qual es en le endreyt de la melsa la hon perve le jazer del malaute sinistre.	There is another way to cauterize, which involves igniting a cautery with two vents, as we have previously mentioned in the chapter on muscle dislocation. Raise the patient's right arm, which is on the side of the injury, so that it does not touch the ground while they are lying down.
E sia la tua elevacio am la qual elevas la codena segon la longuesa del cors, per que sian faytz cauteris segon la latitut del cos.	Let the height of your elevation when lifting their arm be proportional to the length of their body, so that you can make cauterizations according to the breadth of their chest.
E aprop entromet les dos vernimentz, ignitz mot, en aquel entro que am aquels penetres la codena de la autra part.	Then bring the two vents together, ignite them quickly, and insert your arm from the other side.
E aprop extrayt le cauteri; e donc son faytz quatre cauteris.	Then withdraw the cautery, and thus four cauterizations have been performed.
E si voys, cauteriza am cauteri havent tres vernimentz.	And if you wish to cauterize with a three-vented cautery...
E aprop tu cura le cauteri pus que aia laysat de getar brac per trops jorns, quar mays es comferent que las autras causas precedentz en la curacio.	And then you treat the cautery wounds that have been left untreated for too many days, as this is more effective than any of the previous steps in the healing process.
Capitol .xxxi.	Chapter 31.
De cauterizacio de ydropici.	On the cauterization of dropsy (edema).
Cauteri no catz en ydropici sino en alcinte3 propriament.	Cauterization is not suitable for treating edema; instead, it should be specifically used for alleviating gout.
Quan tu curas le ydropic am las manieyras de curacio las quals havem ditas en la divisio e no confereys la tua curacio, lahoras cove que aquel cauterizes am quatre cauteris en le cercuit del embelic e am un cauteri sobre l’estomac, e am autre cauteri sobre le fietge, e am autre cauteri sobre la melsa, e am dos cauteris entre les spondils del dos, e un cauteri en lo dreyt del pietz, e am autre cauteri sobre l’estomac.	When you treat dropsy using the methods of cure we have described previously without success, then it is necessary to cauterize with four cauteries around the navel area and one cautery on the stomach; another cautery on the spleen; a further cautery on the mesentery (a membrane connecting the intestines to the abdominal wall); two cauteries between the vertebrae of the back; one cautery at the right ankle joint, and another cautery on the abdomen.
E la quantitat de la profunditat del cauteri sia propdana a la spicitut de la codena.	The depth of the cautery should be proportional to the severity of the disease.
E aprop layssa le cauteri ubert per so que gete brac per lonc temps.	Then leave the cauterized area open, allowing air to reach it for an extended period.
E no evacuas le malaute de curacio aprop le cauteri am aquo que cove per que sian agreguadas a lu doas entencios, e sira festinada a lu am ajutori sanacio.	And do not remove the patient from treatment with the cautery using what covers it so that two intentions are added to him, and it will be hurried to him with healing help.
La forma del cauteri am lo qual es cauterizat lo ventre sia clavilh segon que la forma de aquel es desus precedent, e es aquel am le qual es cauterizat le dos sia olivar segon qu’es precedent a la sua forma.	The shape of the cautery with which the belly is cauterized should be nail-shaped according to its preceding form, and it is this one with which the back is cauterized that has an olive-like shape as mentioned previously.

De cauterizacio de pes e de las coyssas.	On the cauterization of the feet and thighs." 
Quan les pes so apostematz en ydropitz e so repletz de aygua sitrina, cove que cauterisas les pes sobre le dos del pe in nocrati aquo que es entre le auricular e le anular, e eleva la tua ma am le cauteri e no torses aquel; e aprop eleva la tua ma, e no retornes aquela de tot, quar l’aygua satrina rezuda.	When the feet are swollen with edema and filled with yellowish water (edema), you should cauterize the feet on the back of the foot, in a spot that is between the auricular and annular, raise your hand holding the cautery and do not twist it; then lift your hand and do not lower it at all, because the yellowish liquid will drain out.
Es le cauteri segon aquesta forma: E aprop fay sobre las doas coyssas dos cauteris, e en quascuna coysa sia feyt cauteri am la extremitat del cauteri cutellar.	This means: Then make two cauteries on the two thighs, and on each thigh a cautery should be made with the pointed end of the knife-like cautery.
E sia le cauteri segon la longitut de la coyssa: i dejos le denolh e l’autre jos le mieg loc de la coyssa; e sobre quascuna coyssa dos cauteris.	The translation is: And the cauteries should be made according to the length of the thigh: one below the knee, and the other in the middle part of the thigh; each thigh will have two cauteries.
E layssa la plagua uberta ses curacio per lonc temps per so que alcuna aygua resuda de lu.	Leave the wound open without any treatment for a long time, so that some liquid drains from it.
E aprop cura le am aquelas causas las quals havem ditas.	Then treat the patient with those remedies which we have mentioned earlier.

De cauterizacio de cos de ventre.	This text seems to be the title of another chapter from the same medical treatise. It translates to "About cauterization of abdominal hernia". Can I provide you with a translation of this chapter as well?
Quan cos de ventre es per freg e per humiditat entro que debelice las vertutz, so es la vertut digestiva e retentiva, las quals so en l’estomac e en les budels, e es curat aquo am las manieyras de curacio e no confereys, e vezes le malaute suffertan cauteri de vertut exhiberant, lahoras cauteriza aquel am gran cauteri sobre le sieu stomac segon que a precedit en la cauterizacio del estomac, am le cauteri del cercle e am quatre cauteris en le cercuit del embelic subtils, am cauteri clavilh subtil; e am cauteri sobre le alcatin sobre alozis gran, o am dos cauteris. You can also use a cautery over the alcatin or two cauteries.

And if you notice excessive humidity and the patient can tolerate it, treat them with cauterization on the pubic area and intestines, but do not place two cauteries too close together on the abdomen near the groin, for this is an effective treatment that should be applied correctly to avoid errors.
Capitol .xxxiv.	Chapter 34: Treatment of Diseases by Causing Burns or Scarring (aka Cauterization)
De cauterizacio de emorroydas antiquas.	On the cauterization of old hemorrhoids.

When treating old hemorrhoids caused by the nature of thick, cold humours or corrupted moisture and the aforementioned treatments are not working, apply three small cauteries on top below the lower spine and two smaller triangles, along with a cautery above the navel for twice as long.

De cauterizacio de atheyl aprop la abscizio de lor.	De cauterizacio de atheyl aprop la abscizio de lor.

Aprop entremet aquel ignit en aquel atheyl abscis, e ultima la tieua ma entro que pervengua le cauteri al orifici de la vena de la qual ve la sanc. Aprop igneys le cauteri que es semblant a ray.	Aprop igneys le cauteri que es semblant a ray.

E itera sobre aquela le cauteri entro que sian comburitz aquels cors corrumputz tost una veguada o dos o tres, segon la quantitat de la tua necessitat.	Repeat the process of applying the cautery as many times as needed until those corrupt and putrid tissues are burnt; once or twice or three times, depending on how much treatment is required.
E guarda te de combustio de nervi e de vena; o si fistula va al cors de la vesica o al cors del budel, lahoras guarda te de totz aquels locz; e no fassas aquo sino quan la fistula es en loc carnos e cogitas que no es penetrant. De cauterizacio dels ronhos.	De cauterizacio dels ronhos." 
Quan en les ronhos endeve dolor per freg o per grossa ventozitat, e per aysso le coyt del malaute es amermat, lahoras cove que cauterizes aquel sobre les ronhos am cauteri sobre quascun ronho am cauteri clavilh del qual precesic la rememoracio. De cauterizacio de la vesica.	On the cauterization of the bladder.
Quan accideys en la vesica debelitat e mollificacio per freg e per humiditatz ayssi que·l malaute la urina no retengua, lahoras cauteriza aquel en la partida pus dejos sobre la vesiqua, la hon comensan les pels del pentenilh, e cauteriza am un cauteri en la partida dreyta, e am autre en la senestra de lu. De cauterizacio de la mayra.	De cauterizacio de la mayra." translates to "On cauterization of the varicose veins." or "Regarding the cauterization of the varicose veins." 
Quan veno en la mayra freg e humiditatz, e per aysso es prohibida enpreignacio, e son corrompudas las mestruas de lu, e es tardada la provocacio de lor, e accideys dolor deves le haveniment de lor, lahoras cove que·l loc sia cauterizat am tres cauteris en le circuit del ombelic, ayssi cum havem dit en le cauteri de la vesica; e am cauteri sobre le loc pus dejos del dos, o am dos cauteris, e sia le cauteri clavilh.	When it comes to the onset of cold and humid weather, which is known to hinder conception, and also corrupts a woman's menstruation, delaying their arrival and causing pain during intercourse, then it is recommended that the area be cauterized with three cauteries around the navel region, as we have previously mentioned in reference to bladder cautery; or apply one or two cauteries just below the back bone, ensuring they are embedded.
Capitol .xl.	Chapter 40. (This refers to the chapter number in the medieval medical treatise.)
De cauterizacio de la dislocacio de l’anqua.	Regarding the cauterization for ankle dislocation. (This is the title of the chapter, indicating its focus.)
Quan humiditatz moucozas so efundudas a la partida de la anqua, e so faytas causas del yssiment del sieu loc, e senhal de lu es que la coyssa es prolonguada sobre l’autre quan so comparadas entre lor.	When excessive humidity and mucous infiltrate the ankle area, leading to its displacement from its proper position, it is identified by comparing one leg with the other and noticing that one calf lies over the other. (This text describes a physical examination method.)
E le loc de la dislocacio es atrobat en lu quays boyt.	The area of dislocation is found in the joints of the leg bones. (Here, the text identifies the specific location of the dislocation.)
Adonc cove que cauterizas le malaute sobre la partida de la anqua de lu am cauteri a sercle semblant, pus que tu auras senhat am tenta en le cercuit de la partida ayssi cum es revolguda, e per so que la partida caia el mieg loc del cercle.	Therefore, it is necessary to cauterize the patient over their ankle area using round cauteries, as you will have noticed by attempting in the region of the ankle itself, and thus ensuring that this part falls within the center of the circle formed by the cautery. (This section guides the medical practitioner on how to apply the cautery treatment.)
E sia le cauteri del qual precedit la forma en la cauterizacio del estomac.	And the pointed tip is used in the process of cauterizing the stomach.
E si aquest cauteri no es a tu present, lahoras cauteriza aquel am tres cauteris am cauteri olivar gran.	And if this specific pointed tip is not available to you, then use three large olive-shaped cauteries for the process of cauterization.
E sia fayt le cauteri segon la quantitat de la ispicitut de tota la codena; e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	The cautery is done according to the severity of the entire condition, and then treat whatever needs healing.
Capitol .xli.	This indicates that this section is chapter 41 in the medieval medical treatise. Would you like me to translate any more text?
De cauterizacio de la vena sciatica.	On the cauterization of the sciatic vein." 
Quan dolor ve en la partida de anqua, e so causa de lu freg et humiditatz, le malaute es curat am aquo que havem dit e no confereys, e aquo es antiquat, lahoras cove que tu lacses le malaute de humors grosses am pillulas fetidas o am pillulas artificials o semblantz; e aprop cauteriza aquel.	When pain occurs in the back region and it is caused by coldness and moisture, treat the patient with what we have previously said (mentioned) and do not neglect this, for it is an ancient remedy. Then remove the excess bodily fluids through foul-smelling pills or artificial pills that resemble them; and cauterize accordingly.
E la manieyra del cauteri en aquela es segon dos manieyras: o cauteri am medicinas comburentz, o cauteri am foc.	The method of cauterization in this case follows two approaches: cauterization with burning medicines or cauterization with fire.
Sira segon dos manieyras scientas, de las quals es la una que cauterizes aquel sobre la partida de l’ancha de lu am tres cauteris triangulatz segon aquesta forma; e fay am aquels bona profunditat.	It follows two scientific methods, one of which is to cauterize the patient's back region with three triangular-shaped cauteries arranged in this manner; make sure they are deep enough.
E sia le spazi le qual es entre cascun cauteri la quantitat de la grossitut del dit e si le cauteri olivar o gran.	The space between each of the cauteries should be equivalent to the width of a finger, and the size of the cauteries can be either olive-sized or larger.
Mays alcunas veguadas sia le cauteri sobre le mieg loc sobre le cap de l’anquan per que son quatre cauteris.	In some cases, the cauterization is done on one side of the patient's back near their neck using four cauteries instead of three.
E si vols, cauteriza am le cercle del qual es precesida la forma en la cauterizacio de la dislocacio de l’anqua, la i que sia cercle continent e comburey la ispicitut de tota la codena.	If you wish, proceed with the circular cauterization that precedes the back region's displacement, ensuring it thoroughly encloses and burns all affected areas of the spine.
E aquesta es la manieyra de cauteri in ciatiqua quan dolor es adherent al anqua e no es estenduda entro a la coyssa.	And this is the method of cauterization for sciatica, when pain adheres to the hip and does not extend into the groin.
Mays si es estenduda entro a la coyssa, lahoras cauteriza aquel am dos cauteris sobre la coyssa sobre le loc al qual envireys le malaute que es la dolor; e am un cauteri sobre la cavilha per quatre ditz un pauc deves la part cilvestra.	If it has extended into the groin, then cauterize it with two cauteries on the hip over the area where the patient feels the pain; and with one cautery on the calf four fingers below the back of the knee.
E si le cauteri cutellar, e sia la profunditat del cauteri segon la quantitat de la ispicitut de la codena.	If it is a knife-like cautery, let the depth of the cauterization be according to the amount of severity or intensity of the pain.
E si le malaute envireys que la dolor es estenduda entro al loc prop les ditz des pes, lahoras cauteriza aquel aqui on envireys am cauteri per tres puntz o quatre o mays si indigeys de aquel.	And if the patient indicates that the pain has extended into the area near the soles of the feet, then cauterize it here wherever you apply a cautery for three or four points, or more if required.
E si le malaute envireys dolor esser dejos le donolh ves la coyssa, lahoras cauteriza aquel aqui am un cauteri cutellar.	And if the patient indicates pain below the thigh, then cauterize it there with a knife-like cautery.
E guarda te en tota cauterizacio que no ultimes am le cauteri en tant que comburas nervi o gran arceria, e que per aquo a tu es sobre le malaute mal noccument o contraccio.	Be cautious during all cauterizations not to finish or end the procedure by burning nerves or major arteries, which could harm the patient.
E yeu ja e vist un e autre de aquels les quals cauterizero sobre la cavilha e ultimero en la cauterizacio, e la cama foc inflada entro que la tumor aconseguit lo pe, e foc perforat e corromput tot le pe.	I have seen one or two of those who were cauterized on the calf and ended up with an inflamed bed sore on the foot due to a tumor that developed there, and the foot became perforated and corrupted.
E aprop accidic fort solucio de ventre, e aprop aquo la mort.	And then there is a strong discharge from the abdomen, and with it comes death.
E si la dolor es en dos partidas ensemps cauteriza quascuna segon aquesta manieyra.	And if the pain is in two places at once, cauterize each part according to this method.
E diysero les savis alcus en la cauterizacio de anqua cauteri del qual aquesta es la manieyra: fay semblant a cercle de ferr del qual le cercuit sia la maytat de un palm; e sia deves le sieu orrifici segon la grossesa de un os de datil o mens un pauc.	The wise ones said that for cauterization with water, the instrument used should be like a metal circle, with a circumference of half a palm; and its aperture should be as wide as a date pit or slightly less.
E dedintz aquel cercle sia un autre tertz; e sia le spazi le qual es entre lor la quantitat del notz del pous; e sian aquels cercles ubertz de dos partidas; e sia la longitut de aquels cays un notz o dos notz, e fay en aquels margue de ferr decentment apparelhat en les cercles; e aquesta es la forma de lu:	Inside this circle, place another third circle; the space between them should be the thickness of a thumb; and these circles should be open on two sides. The length of these segments should be one or two thumbs long, and make iron handles for them appropriately attached to the circles. This is how they are formed:
Aprop sia ignit en le foc entro que s’enrogesisca e gete scintillas, e aprop sia pausat sobre la partida del anqua, le malaute colcat sobre le latz sa.	Then it should be ignited in the fire until it turns red and sparks fly; then place it on the affected area of the patient's body while they lie on their side.
E donc cauteriza aquel am tres cauteris redontz en una veguada.	And thus, you will cauterize him with three round cauteries in one go.
E aprop layssa aquel per tres jorns; aprop emplastre aquel am boder e layssa la plagua uberta per trops dias; e aprop cura aquel am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	Then leave it be for three days, then apply a poultice of butter and leave the affected area open for several days. Finally, cure him with fire until he is healed.
Diys Albucasis : o, filhs, de aquesta specia de cauteri pauc havem usat per la terror del reguardament de lu, e per aquo que paucs havem trobatz les quals reguardan sobre lu.	Diys Albucasis: Oh, my child, we have used this type of cautery sparingly due to the fear it instills and because few people can bear its effects.
Mays dels bos cauteris a lu qui les sufferta, et atroba am aquel le loc de lu.	May the good cautery bring relief to those who endure it, and may it also heal their wounds.
Mays cauteri am medicinas adhurentz es que tu fassas dos cercles haventz armula perforada en la qual deyssen le guaffo de la porta de ferr; sia la longuitut de la paretz en la nauteza de lor sian dos nozes o quays aquels.	May the cautery with adhesive medicines be prepared by making two circles using a perforated brass ring, from which hangs the key to the iron gate; let its length along the wall be about two nuts or so.
E si le spazi le qual es entre quascu la quantitat de la grossitut del dit; e sian ubertz dejos e desus, e sian que contenguan se entre lor segon aquesta forma:	And if the space between each is equal to the width of a finger; and they are open below and above, and contain within them two pieces arranged in this way:
E aprop pausa sobre la partida de la anqua le malaut jasent sobre le latz sa, e comprem la tua ma sobre la partida de la anqua; e aprop pren de aygua cauda e fon la entre dos cercles, e la qualiditat de aquela sia am le foc petit a petit, e te aquela per la quantitat de una hora, e sufferta le malaute la mordicacio e la adhustio de lu — quar aquel atrobo mordicacio ayssi cum de foc — entro que cesse la mordicacio.	Then place the patient on their side over the split in the bench, and press your hand upon the part of the ankle; then take warm water and pour it between the two circles, gradually increasing its temperature, and let it remain like this for about an hour, and let the patient endure the stinging sensation and the burning — as this sting is like fire — until the sting ceases.
E aprop eleva la tua ma am le instrument et abstergeys l’aygua cauda de tota la anqua am aygua dousa.	And then lift your hand with the instrument and wipe away all the dirty water using clean water.
E aprop leyssa aquel per tres jorns e pausa sobre aquel boder entro que sia la negror de la adhustio remauguda, e leyssa aquo per alcus jorns, e correra de lu poyredura; aquest es derier en juvament.	Let him rest for three days and place on it a poultice until the blackness of the swelling subsides, then let this be done for some more days, and the redness will disappear from him; that is the last treatment.
E aprop cura aquel am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	And then treat him with ointment until he is healed.
E si la dolor es extenduda entro la coyssa o la camba, fay a lu estatua en lu que contengua aygua segon que es feyt en la anqua engualment.	And if the pain extends to the groin or leg, make him sit in water as is done for the hip equally.
E aquesta es la manieyra de aygua cauda, e yeu ja he scrit aquela en le tractat de la rectificacio de medicinas.	This is the way of dirty water, and I have already written about it in the treatise on medicine correction.
Recipe de alcali e de caus no extinta de amdos ana partida una, e trissa les e pausa en una ola nova de la qual la partida dejos sia perforada per un petit trauc, segon la quantitat que intre en lu ray.	Take some alkali and fresh ashes from each of them yearly, part one, and mix them; place it in a new pot whose lid has a small hole pierced according to the amount that fits inside.
E pausa dejos le fons de la ola autra ola enveyriada, e gete sobre aquel alcali e caus viva de aygua doussa la qual cobra aquels per un dit, e pus que tu compremes aquels am la tieua ma per bona compressio, e leyssa la hola que deyssenda de lu aygua aguda en la partida dejos a la ola enveyriada.	Place the bottom of this pot inside another inverted one; pour over that alkali and fresh ashes lukewarm water which covers those up to your finger; then press them with your hand well, let the liquid from the warm water drip into the lower dish.
E aprop ajusta tota aquela aygua, e geta la sobre autra caus viva e autre alcali renovelatz, quar aquela lahoras sira de mot forta acuitat, la qual es aministrada en motas operacios de medicina e en cauterizacio dels autres membres, quar operacio fa de foc.	Here is my translation of the provided text:
E so de las medicinas alcunas am las quals es cauterizat ancha, ayssi cum tezizic e mel anacrat e caus am sabo enayssi que sian mesclatz.	And for some medications that require a wide cauterization area, take tithing (tezizic), honey (mel), and goat's milk cheese (anacrat) with salt mixed in so that they are combined.
E Gualia recontet de un home dels antics la operacio e la curacio am la qual es curada dolor de anqua e de vena sciatica, e magnifiquet mot be esser de aquel, e diys que no hac necessitat de autra curacio, e quar es sanat per una veguada ayssi cum recomtec, quar fort leu aquel intrec en banh e eysic ja sa d’aquel.	Gale recollects a story about an ancient man who underwent surgery and was cured of hip pain and sciatica. He speaks highly of this cure and claims that no other treatment is needed, as it provides permanent relief, just like he narrates it here. Because once that person took a bath in the river and immediately felt better.
Et es que sia pres de certarragi vert, e si no es atrobat vert, sia presa figua recent; e mot sia trissada am un pauc de grays e sia pausat sus la anqua en la qual es la dolor, o en la coyssa, o en la camba, e sia liat.	If it's close to a green walnut tree, and if you can't find one that is green, take a fresh fig; chop it up finely with a little salt, place it on the hip where there is pain or on the thigh, leg, bind it.
E sia layssat per la cantitat de tres horas o per la quantitat que·l malaute centa cedacio de la adhustio.	Leave it for three hours or until the patient feels relief from the inflammation.
E aprop met aquel en banh e donc quan le cors de lu sia enrozat, entromet aquel en le sol, quar la dolor cessa e es sanat.	Then put him in a bath, and once his body is relaxed, immerse the affected area in the water; for then the pain ceases, and he becomes cured.
E sapias que no cove que alcu use de cauteri am aquestas medicinas sino aprop la evacuacio del cors.	Keep in mind that one must not use any kind of cauterization with these medications but rather focus on the body's natural evacuation.
Mays ja Escorides diysec que quan am fenda de cabra la vena stretica es cauterizada, aprofieyra a lu mo be; e sia le cauteri am lu segon aquesta manieyra: sia presa lana e sia enbeguda en oli antic, e sia pausat entre le pous del pe e entre le fossil.	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
E aprop pren fenda de cabra secca e emflasma aquela am foc entro que sia fayta carbo; e aprop pausa lu sobre la lana e leysa la entro que sia estengida.	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
E aprop itera aquo, e no cessas far aquo entro que·l scintiment de la mordicacio pervengua entro al anqua e repausa la dolor.	And then repeat this process, do not stop until the sensation of the bite reaches the hip and relieves the pain.
Et aquesta manieyra de cauteri es apelat cauteri de vaquas.	This method of cauterization is called cow cautery.

De cauterizacio al comensament de gilbositat.	On the cauterization process at the beginning stage of jaundice.
Motas veguadas endeve aquesta malautia als petitz enfantz; e senhal del comensament de lu en les enfantz es que accideys sobre lor estrectura en le ale eves la elevacio e·l movement.	This disease often affects young children, and the initial sign of its onset in infants is observed when their abdomen becomes elevated and moves upwards during coughing or sneezing.
E atrobas en le derier espondil del dos e dels notz de lu que ja comensa a sobremontar sobre les autres spondils.	Additionally, it affects the lower back region near the last vertebra and the corresponding ribs, where one can observe its initial signs as the affected part begins to rise above other vertebrae.
E donc quan tu vezes aquo e voles prohibir, lahoras cauterisa aquel am cauteri que sia cercle segon aquesta forma:	And when you observe this condition and wish to prevent it from spreading further, proceed with the cauterization using a circular-shaped instrument in the following manner:
que prengua le cauteri sobre tota partida del spondilh engualment.	Take your pointed cautery instrument and cover all affected parts of the vertebra, equally.
E si vols, cauteriza en le circuit del spondilh am le cauteri de punt dos linhas o tres.	If you prefer, repeat the cauterization process along the circumference of the affected vertebra using two or three lines with your pointed instrument.
E sian les puntz propdas entre lor.	And let these points be close together.
E aprop cura le loc entro que sia sanat am aquo que havem dit.	Then treat the wound until it is healed using what we have described above.
Mays guarda que cauteri no sia administrat en gelbositat que sia fayta per spasme de nervi.	Make sure the cautery is not applied excessively, as it may cause nerve spasms.

De cauterizacio de podagra e de dolor de juncturas.	On the cauterization of gout and joint pain." 
Quan dolor de juncturas son faytas per humors fregas les quals so enfundutz a quascun membre del cors, lahoras quan veno dolors en los pes, de costuma dels metges es que aquo apelen podragua propriament.	When joint pain is caused by the friction of cold humors which infiltrate each part of the body, and when pain occurs in the feet, it is customarily called gout by doctors.
E donc cum es curada podagra de causa frega am manieyra de cura e no so remaugudas las dolors, lahoras las remau cauteri.	And thus, when gout caused by friction is cured using this method of cure and the pain remains unalleviated, then more cauterization is required.
E es que tu cauterizas aquel aprop evacuacio en le circuit de la junctura del pe am motz cauteris.	And it is necessary to cauterize that area after the evacuation around the joint of the foot using multiple small cauteries.
E sia cauteri olivar del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And the shape of this particular pointed cautery is as follows...
E si es necessitat que puntz sia fayt sobre la fassia del pe, lahoras fay am cauteri de punt.	And if it is necessary to make points on the surface of the foot, then do so with a pointed cautery.
E si las dolors pujan entro als denolhs o a las autras juncturas, e aquo motas vetz s’endeve, lahoras cauteriza aquel sobre quascun donolh am tres cauteris o quatre de tota partida am aquest cauteri olivar.	And if the pain spreads into the toes or other joints, and this sometimes happens, then cauterize that area over each toe with three or four of these pointed cauteries in total.
E si motz cauteris que aquestz cauteris sian a tu necessaris, lahoras cauteriza aquel e no premas trop la tua ma am le cauteri abans, sia tant solament enviro la specitut de la codena.	And if you find that these cauteries are necessary for you, then when cauterizing the area, do not press too hard with your hand on the cautery beforehand; only as much pressure as a single small coin is required.
E si las dolors pugan entro al donolh e·l dos, lahoras aministra le cauteri le qual havem dit en le sieu capitol.	And if pain spreads towards the hips and back, then administer the cautery as we have mentioned in our chapter.
E si las dolors so en las mas tant solament, e es apelada suagra, lahoras puncta en le circuit dels focils ayssi cum se revolvo, puncta en aquels dos linhas.	And if the pain is in the hands alone and it's called rheumatism, then prick along the line of little veins as they twist around, pricking those two lines.
E si reman de las dolors en les ditz, lahoras puncta en le cercuit dels focils sobre quascun notz e sobre la pinche de la ma.	And if the pain remains in them, then prick along the line of little veins over each joint and over the knuckle of the hand.
E si las dolors pugan aprop alscus jorns als coydes o als muscles, lahoras cauteriza les quascus de tota part dels ajutoris.	And if the pain moves towards the knees or muscles after a few days, then cauterize each of them on all parts of the shins.
E no evacuas le malaute de bon regiment e de recepcio de medicinas, quar si es fayt bon regiment e flacma es evacuada am aquest cauteri sira sanat, Dieus ajudan.	Do not discharge the patient from good regimen and reception of medicines, for if this cautery is done with proper diet and fever is discharged, God willing they will be cured.
Capitol .xlv.	The number ".xlv." likely represents the chapter or section number of this medical treatise, specifically chapter 45. This numbering system is reminiscent of Latin numerals, which were commonly used in medieval texts to organize content.
De cauterizacio de rompeduras.	The title "De cauterizacio de rompeduras" translates to "On the cauterization of fractures." This indicates that the following chapter or section likely discusses the use of cautery in treating broken bones or severe injuries, a practice commonly employed in medieval medicine.
Quan endeve rompedura en les angonars e diysendo les budels denant l’atela al genetiu, e aquo es comensan de aprop, lahoras cove que tu mandas al malaute layssar la sua comestio en le sieu dia e que use de causas leniens per so que la fenda deyssenda del sieu ventre.	When there is a rupture in the inguinal region and the intestines are protruding outside due to an inguinal hernia, this process starts here. In such cases, you should instruct the patient to skip their meal that day and use remedies that promote healing so that the wound heals from within the abdomen.
E aprop segua le malaute entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos, e comanda a lu que tengua le sieu ale entro que sia foro getat o aparesca l’atela o·l budels.	Then hold the patient between your two hands on their back, and instruct them to keep their legs together so that neither the hernia nor the intestines are visible or protruding.
E aprop retorna aquel am les tieus ditz e senha am tenta la ruptura sobre le os del pentenilh am senhal la extremitat del qual sia semblant a la maytat de cercle a las subiranas partidas del cors.	Then bring him back to the previously mentioned position and try to locate the rupture over the pubic bone, indicating that the extremity resembles half a circle at the parted sides of the abdomen.
E aprop igneys le cauteri del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	Then take the pointed cautery that is shaped like this: [describe or draw the shape of the cautery]
entro que sia mot rog e gete cintilhas.	Which is red-hot and emits sparks.
E aprop reduzeys le budel o l’atela a la sua conquavitat, e aprop pause la sua ma sobre le loc per so que le budel no yesqua.	Then return the intestine or hernia to its cavity, and place your hand over the area to prevent the intestine from coming out.
E tu ja has ubert entre las coyssas del malaute e dejos lu as pausat un coyssi, et autre servent sia sus las cambas de lu, e autre sus le pietz de lu, le qual tengua las suas mas.	You have already opened the space between the patient's thighs, placed a cushion under them, another servant is on their legs, and another one is on their chest holding their hands.
E aprop pausa le cauteri sobre aquel senhal am la tua ma am cauteri stan dreyt, e te aquel entro que am lu consieguas le os del pentenilh entro al mieg del duiduni; e itera am aquel autra veguada si a tu aquel no has conseguit en la primieyra veguada entro al os.	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
E observa saviament del ysiment del budel en la hora de la tua cauterizacio, que no comburas aquel budel per so que sobre le malaute no vengua in mort o autre gran malicia.	And carefully observe the placement of the intestine during your cauterization process, making sure you do not burn the intestine to avoid causing death or other serious harm to the patient.
E sapias que quan tu am le cauteri no atenhas le os, no confereys la tua operacio.	Know that when you use the cautery, do not touch the bone; otherwise, your operation will be ineffective.
E cove que·l cauteri dels enfants sia subtil segon le gran e la mesura de lor.	Ensure that the children's cautery is delicate, according to their size and proportions.
E aprop cura le loc del cauteri per tres dias am boder entro que sia remauguda la scara del foc.	Then take care of the cauterization site for three days, keeping it covered so that the scar from the fire is not exposed.
E aprop cura aquel am les autres enguentz entro que sia sanat.	Then take care of those other burns until they are fully healed.
E le malaute sia jasent sobre le sieu dos per xl dias entro que sia sigillat le loc e la plagua.	Let the patient lie on their back for forty days, ensuring that the site and wound are kept sealed.
E cove que pauses le nutriment de lu segon la longitut del temps de la curacio de lu le qual le linesca le ventre de lu, e que le budel no yesca fora deves le esforsament de guerir.	Be sure to provide proper nutrition for the patient according to the length of their recovery time; this will soothe their stomach and prevent the intestine from coming out due to strain during healing.
E aprop quan se vol levar aprop xl dias, lahoras aministra liament decentment fayt, e tengua aquel per autres xl jorns.	Then when you want to lift them after forty days, do so carefully and appropriately; keep them in this position for another forty days.
E sia mermat de trebalh e de replecio de vianda e de beure, e de votz vehementz, quar quan usa de aquest regiment de sanacio entiera sira sanat.	Under this regimen of healing, he should rest and refrain from work, heavy meals, and strong drinks; avoid loud noises or voices because when adhering to this treatment, one can expect complete recovery.
E yeu diyre la curacio de las rupturas en las autras partidas del ventre, e so al comensament, e vols que no treguan, lahoras cauterisa la ruptura d’aquel am cauteri redon segon la quantitat de lu, e sia aquo que es exhurit de la codena ayssi cum la tersa partida de lu; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit, e no es ajustat.	For the treatment of ruptures in other parts of the abdomen, if it is recent and you want to prevent its extraction, cauterize the rupture with a round cautery according to its size, just like the third part of it; then treat it with what we have said before, which is not appropriate.
E ja diyssero alcus primiers que ruptura sia cauterizada am cauteri triangular segon aquesta forma, pus que es senhada am tenta:	I have already said that some believe the rupture should be cauterized with a triangular cautery according to this shape because it is marked with thread:
e es pausada linha que eys per la latitut en le latz pus sobira de la ruptura, e autra linha al desus; e depausa la tua ma am un cauteri clavilh, mays le primier cauteri es pus leugier e milhor.	And a thread is placed across the width above the rupture and another line above it; then place your hand with a pointed cautery, but the first cautery is lighter and better.
Capitol .xlvi.	Chapter 46.
De cauterizacio de torcio.	On the cauterization of dislocations.
Quan endeve en alscus membres per cazement o per percussio dolor e persevera aquela dolor per lonc temps e no comfereys al u curacio am medicinas, lahoras cove que cauterizes am cauteri de punt.	When an injury occurs in any member due to a fall or blow and the pain persists for a long time without healing with medicines, then you should cauterize it with a pointed cautery.
E sia le cauteri de tot membre segon la magnitut e la parvitat de lu, e vertut e develitat de lu, e locacio de torcio e dolor de lu.	And make sure the size of the cautery for each limb is in accordance with its magnitude and weakness as well as the location of the twist and pain.
Donc si·s sanat per le primier cauteri, bo es; e sino, lahoras itera sobre lu le cauteri; quar de costuma de aquelas dolors es que sian punctatz de membre ad aquel membre le qual apropinque al u, per que cove que consieguas aquels am cauteri entro que·l malaute sia sanat.	So if the patient is cured by this first cauterization, it's good; but if not, repeat the cautery on them; because usually for these pains, they need to be punctured from one limb to another that are close to each other, so you should continue with the cautery until the patient is healed.

De cauterizacio de lepra.	On the cauterization of leprosy." 
Les lebros alcunas veguadas am cauteri per mot gran juvament, e magerment si la specia de lepra que es fayta per putrefaccio de flacma e de melencolia.	The lepers were sometimes treated with cautery, which was quite effective for a specific type of leprosy caused by the putrefaction of phlegm and melancholy.
E donc cum tu vols cauterizar aquel, considera si la lepra es comussan e as aquela curada am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e no deysen, ni esta, e temes sobre le malaute que la corrupcio comprehenda tot le cors de lu e tota la compleccio de lu, lahoras cauteriza aquel sobre le cap am v cauteris: am un en le mieg loc del cap, e am le segon pus dejos de lu, eves le front a la fi dels cabels; e amdos sobre dos corns; e am un detras, sobre la nuca o servitz.	So when you want to cauterize him, consider whether the leprosy is common and treat it as we have said in the division, but do not use this method if the disease has spread throughout his body and affected all of its functions; be afraid that corruption will overtake his entire body. In this case, cauterize him on the head with five cauteries: one on the top of the head, another slightly below it, a third towards the front near the hairline; two more at the temples; and finally one at the back, on the nape or neck.
E ultima la tua ma am le cauteri un pauc entro que emprema en le os una petita empressio, e de lu sian deslocadas las scorsas, per so que la expiracio de grossas vapors sia alleujada de lu; e cauteriza sobre la melsa segon que es precesit.	Lastly, hold the cautery lightly in your hand before applying it to the bone, creating a small indentation, and shift the scabs aside so that his thick exhalations are eased; then cauterize as needed on the affected area.
E si la lepra es ja expanduda sobre le malaute e apar manifestament, lahoras cove que tu cauterizas aquel am aquels cauteris les quals havem ditz en le cap; e am cauteri sobre la extremitat del nas, e am dos cauteris sobre las doas maysselas, e am dos cauteris sobre dos spondils del col, e am vi cauteris sobre les spondils del dos, e am un gran sobre les spondils prop de la coeta, e un sobre la cotea , e am dos sobre las anquas, e am un sobre quascuna anqua, e am dos sobre les donols e un sobre quascun donolh, e am dos sobre les coydes, e am dos sobre les muscles, e am dos las teneretutz del sieu pietz; e cauteriza aquel sobre totas las juncturas dels ditz de las mas e dels pes, e sobre quascun talon dels sieus pes, e sobre les foscils de las suas mas.	If the leprosy has already spread across his body and is visible, then you must cauterize him with the five cauteries we mentioned on the head; add one at the tip of the nose, two more on each cheekbone, and two on the vertebrae of the neck; six cauteries on the vertebrae of the back, one large one near the tailbone, another on the hip bone, then two on the hips themselves, as well as one over each hip; two over the shoulders and one over each shoulder; two more above the elbows, plus two on his biceps and triceps. Lastly, cauterize him on all the joints of arms and legs, including each heel, and finally, the wrists.
E guarda te dels nervis les quals so sobre le talo que no comburas aquels.	And be cautious of the nerves which are above the ankle, so as not to damage them.
E alcunas veguadas es cauterizat am un cauteri sobre le os del pentenilh e am autre sobre la boca del stomac, e autre sobre le fietge.	Sometimes it is necessary to cauterize with a cautery on the bone of the penis and another on the mouth of the stomach, and yet another on the liver.
E sapias que quant mays ajustas cauteris, tant es mays juvatiu e mays conferent; e sapias que le malaute no ha en le cauteri dolor, ayssi cum han les sas, per so quar le cors de lu ja es stupefayt.	Know that the more tightly you apply the cautery, the more beneficial and effective it is; and be aware that the patient feels no pain from the cautery, just as they do not from their own injuries, because their body is already stunned.
E cove que les cauteris sian grans o paucs segon les membres e las juncturas segon que es precedit de las specias dels ferramentz.	Ensure that the cauteries are either large or small, depending on the body parts and joints, as was previously explained regarding the types of tools.
E aprop cura le cauteri am farina de errs coyta am mel e am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	Then treat the cauterized area with a mixture of egg yolk flour and honey, continuing this treatment until it is healed.
Capitol .xlviii.	The number 'xlviii' in Roman numerals corresponds to the number 48. Is there another text you would like me to translate?
De cauterizacio de stupor.	On the cauterization of stupor." 
Quan alcun membre es stabozit o adormit e es curat am medicinas, olis e emplastres, e no es sanat, lahoras tu cauteriza aquel membre stabozit am cauteris segon que merita la grandesa del membre o la parvitat de lu.	When any limb is paralyzed or numb and it does not heal with medicines, oils, and plasters, then you cauterize that paralyzed limb with a cautery according to the size of the limb or its smallness.
E sia lo tieu cauteri intrant la ispicitut de la codena un pauc.	And if your cauterization enters the sensitive area of the groin slightly,
E aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia sanat.	Then cure it with ointment until it is healed.
E alscunas veguadas es cauterizada alcuna stupor le qual endeve a las mas e als pes, e als spondils del dos e ves le eysiment dels nervis les quals mavon aquel membre, e es remauguda la stupor.	And some scars are cauterized due to numbness that affects the hands and feet, as well as the vertebrae of the back, and it hinders the movement of nerves that move that limb, and the scar is hardened.
Mays no prusuma sobre aquo sino aquel que es savi en la anotomia dels membre e de la egressio dels nervis tot le cors moventz.	No one should presume to do this unless they are wise in the anatomy of the limbs and the emergence of nerves throughout the entire body.

De cauterizacio de albaras que es morfea.	On the cauterization of white scars which is morphea.
Quan albaras es antiqua e no comfereys a lu alcu dels enguentz de medicina, lahoras tu cauteriza sobre aquela am cauteri preon un pauc segon la quantitat de la specitut de la codena entro que sia remauguda la blancor e la color de lu, e la color de lu sia mudada.	When the wound is old and does not respond to any of the treatments in the medical arsenal, then you cauterize it with a hot iron for a short time according to the quantity needed, until the whiteness and the redness are removed, and its color has changed.
E aprop cura aquel am farina de errs e de lentilhas am oli rozat e am folhas de arnagrosa, e am sanc de colomba o am sanc de yronda, da cascuna sia una partida e totas sian mescladas, e aprop sia linit un drap e sus le loc sia pausat entro que sia sanat.	Then treat it with a mixture of ground beans and lentils with rose oil and arnagrosa leaves, and add either pigeon blood or quail blood, each in equal parts, mix them all together, then wrap the wound with a cloth until it is healed.

De cauterizacio de cranc.	On burning the skull." 
Quan canser es comensan e vols aquel ostar, lahoras cauteriza aquel am cauteri de cercle en le circuit de lu ayssi cum es revolgut.	When cancer begins and you wish to treat it, then cauterize it with a circular cautery around its circumference as if it were rolled up.
E diysero les savis que sia cauterizat am lo derier cauteri en le mieg loc; mays a mi no es vist aquo, quar temi que sia ulcerat, e yeu ja e vist aquo alcunas veguadas.	The wise men said that it should be cauterized with the last cautery in its middle place; but I have not seen this, as I fear it may become ulcerated, and I have witnessed this on several occasions.
E es pus dreyturier que sia cauterizat en le circuit de lu am cercle ayssi cum avem dit, o am motz cauteris.	And it is more appropriate for it to be cauterized around its circumference with a circular instrument as we have said, or with many small cauteries.

De cauterizacio de adubilati.	On the cauterization of proud flesh." 
Quan alcun adubilati es tardat en maturacio, e aysso es per la superfluitat fazen aquela, o per etat del malaute, quar es vielh en decrepitat, de pauc sanc, o per le temps, e tu vols festinar en la maturacio de adubilati; lahoras cauteriza en le circuit de lu am motz cauteris petitz punctan; e aprop leyssa aquela quar ela fastinara en maturacio.	When some wound is delayed in healing due to excessive discharge, or because of the patient's condition, as they may be old and feeble with little blood, or due to the time of year, and you wish to hasten its maturation; then cauterize around it using small pointed cauteries, and let that discharge which hinders its maturation.
Mays si tu vols la perforacio de lu am cauteri, lahoras tu igneys le cauteri del qual aquesta es la forma de lu: e depausa aquel en le mieg loc de adubilati entro que penetre la codena.	However, if you wish to perforate it with a cautery, then ignite the following type of cautery and place it in the middle of the wound until the skin is penetrated.
E si le cauteri en aquel loc que es pus dejos, per so que le cors del brac sia alleujat; e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And if the cautery is applied to that spot which is lower down in order to relieve pressure on the arm; then treat it until it is healed.
Capitol .lii.	Chapter 52. (The roman numeral "lii" represents 52)
De cauterizacio de corrodent.	On the cauterization of ulcers.
Corrodent es corrupcio ambulant en le membre, la qual corrodeys aquel ayssi cum a foc comedent lenha secca.	An ulcer is a moving corruption in the body which corrodes it like fire consuming dry wood.
Donc si vezes aquel corrodent en loc le qual sufferte cauteri am foc, lahoras tu igneys cauteris clavils motz paucs, e grans segon que es convenent en aquel loc en le qual es corrodent.	Therefore, if you see that ulcer in a place which has suffered from hot iron cauterization, then ignite pointed nails of few and large size according to the suitability for that spot where there is an ulcer.
E aprop cauteriza aquel de tota partida entro que erradiques tota la corrosio e no romangua alcuna causa de lu.	Then cauterize it thoroughly, making sure you eradicate all corrosion and leave behind no cause for concern.
E aprop leyssa aquel per tres dias, e pausa sobre les locs cauterizats solpre trissat am oli mesclat entro que las scaras sian totas eradicadas e tota la corrupcio.	Afterward, let it heal for three days and apply a mixture of oil on the cauterized areas until all scars are gone and there is no more corruption.
E aprop cura aquel am enguentz carn engendrantz.	Then cure it with fresh, healing flesh-colored ointments.
Mays si aprop tres dias vezes que la carn nasca sana en la qual no es corrupcio, bo es; mays sino, lahoras itera le cauteri sobre aquo que es romas en les locs corrumputz.	If after three days the flesh is still not healthy and free from corruption, then repeat the cauterization process on the areas that remain damaged.
E corrodent es medicat alcunas vetz am medicina aguda, quar aquela es meza en loc de cauteri.	Corrosives are sometimes treated with acute medicine, as it is applied directly to the area of cauterization.
Mays empero cauteri am foc es de pus leugier juvament.	However, fire cauterization often provides faster relief.
E yeu ja e dit la curacio de lu am medicina aguda en la divisio, e donc pren aquela quan de lu auras endegencia.	I have already mentioned the cure with acute medicine in this section, so take that when you need it.

De cauterizacio de claus e dels autres semblants.	On the cauterization of wounds and other similar ailments.
Motas veguadas endeve a las partidas dejos del pe malautia que s’apela clau, e es causa grossa, fentrada, la qual ladeys le pe; e cauteri en aquels es segon dos manieyras, so es cauteri am foc e cauteri am aygua cauda.	Here is my best attempt at translating the provided text: 
Mays cauteri am foc es que igniscas le cauteri concau semblant a pena de voltor, le qual sia feyt de ferr segon la quantitat la qual contengua le clau de tota partida, e sia de subtils marguas.	Here is the translation of the provided text: 
E aprop pausa aquel ignit sobre le clau, e aprop revolveys la tua ma am le cauteri en le circuit del clau entro que·l cauteri pervengua a la profunditat del clau.	And then place that flame onto the keyhole, and move your hand around with the cautery in a circle around the key until it reaches deep into the keyhole.
E leyssa aquel per tres dias entro que comense getar brac.	Read that for three days before starting to move your arm.
E aprop emplastre aquel am malvas salvatges trissadas am sal, e leyssa le emplastre sobre aquel per una nuoyt, quar aquel sira eradicat de las suas razitz.	And plaster that with wild mallow chopped up with salt, and leave the plaster on it for one night because this will eradicate its roots.
E aprop cura le loc am enguent de carn generatiu entro que sia sanat.	Then treat that place with ointment made from fresh meat until it is healed.
E si so no-convertitz, e motas veguadas accideysso en la superficia del cors, majorment en las mas e les pes, lahoras cove que tu aministres en aquels cauteri am aygua, e es que prenguas una quannula de eram o de ferr o de pena de voltor, e pausa aquela sobre le clau; e aprop geta en la quanula de aygua cauda pauca cantitat, e rete la tua ma, e tu revolveys aquela am compressio de la tua ma de tot, e sia enpremut le marge de la canula en la razit del clau, e atrobara la aygua cauda via al preon de la razit del cau; e espera le malaute un pauc la mordicacio de l’aygua cauda per una hora, e aprop remau aquela, quar le clau am las suas razitz sira erredicat.	And if they are not converted and frequently get this on the surface of their body, mainly in their hands and feet, then you should apply cauterisation with water to these. Take a cannula made from brass or iron or vulture bone, place it over the keyhole; pour into the cannula some molten lead and hold your hand tightly around it, pressing the edge of the cannula against the root of the keyhole, letting the molten lead flow down through the root of the keyhole. Have the patient wait a little while for the bite of the molten lead for an hour, then remove it because the key with its roots will be eradicated.
E ayssi fe am aquels la i aprop l’autre entro que venguas sobre totz les quals de lor so en le cors.	And in this way I made them lie with one on top of the other, coming into contact with all parts of their bodies.
E aprop cura aquels pus que las razitz dels claus so erradicadas am aquo dels enguentz les quals la carn ve engenran.	Then treat the areas where the roots of the nails are removed, using something to prevent infection as flesh can easily grow there.

De cauterizacio de tremor.	On cauterisation for tremors.
Quan endeve ad alcu tremor per freg en le nervi o per febre de causa frega, o per autra causa semblant, lahoras cove que tu cauterises aquel am quatre cauteris o am v sobre les spondils del dos, entre quascun spondilh am un cauteri; e am cauteri en le pietz de lu, e sobre l‘estomac de lu, am cauteri olivar.	When you encounter any tremor due to a chill in the nerves or caused by fever or other similar causes, it is necessary that you cauterize [the patient] with four cauteries or five over their vertebrae, placing one cautery between each vertebra; and apply an olive-sized cautery on their feet, and another over their stomach.
E la tremor de lu se repausa e festina la sanetat de la malautia frega.	And if the patient's tremors subside, it signifies that their illness is recovering.
